title: Looking For Duo Partner
body: I am Gold 1 about to breach the Platinum Gate, I need assistance as I have already lost 2 games in my series. I am a Jarvan player, so if you want to help me become a platinum then please go ahead and add me. I can use discord if you so desire. Also if we lose by some unlucky will of God then if you believe worthy, I would like to continue playing to get into series again.

replies.body: Are you familiar with the Orianna+Jarvan combo? I have a good amount of tournament experience with it and I think we could make it work in solo queue as well with some practice. Pushing through to mid plat should be easily possible as long as we can build some proper synergy.
